thread.title: Emilia Clarke Cuddles Jason Momoa as They Reunite During Paris Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Emilia Clarke Cuddles Jason Momoa as They Reunite During Paris Fashion Week

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Emilia Clarke Cuddles Jason Momoa as They Reunite During Paris Fashion Week
text:
Comments The actress who plays Daenerys Targaryen on 'Game of Thrones' sits on and cuddles her former co-star Jason during a reunion in Paris Fashion Week. 
Emilia Clarke and her former " Game of Thrones " co-star Jason Momoa reunited during Paris Fashion Week. The actress who plays Daenerys Targaryen, the aspiring queen of the Realm, took to Instagram on October 2 to share an adorable snap of her alongside Jason. The snap showed Emilia sitting on and cuddling the actor who played Khal Drogo. The 26-year-old actress giggled on Jason's lap. Similarly, Jason was all smiles in the snap. She captioned it, "Well I guess the sun rises in the west and sets in the east then huh? Paris fashion week just kicked off....!" alongside the hashtags "Momoa love for life baby," "no more beer left in paris" and "best dressed dothraki." Foto kiriman @emilia_clarke pada Okt 2, 2015 pada 4:37 PDT Jason also posted four snaps of their reunion on his Instagram account. The 36-year-old actor really got into his character on the HBO series during the reunion as she called Emilia "Khaleesi." One of the snaps showed the actress smiling ear to ear while donning a hat. He cheekily captioned it, "My khalessi @emilia_clarke When she smiles at you " Foto kiriman Jason Momoa (@prideofgypsies) pada Okt 2, 2015 pada 6:13 PDT A caption for a snap showing Jason and Emilia laughing together read, "Goofballs @emilia_clarke my khalessi. What a women." Meanwhile, for another snap showing Emilia covering her lips with her hand, the caption read, "[Too] f**king cute." Foto kiriman Jason Momoa (@prideofgypsies) pada Okt 2, 2015 pada 6:16 PDT Foto kiriman Jason Momoa (@prideofgypsies) pada Okt 2, 2015 pada 6:17 PDT The last snap showed Emilia showing cheeky smile while donning the hat which covered one of her eyes. "Really sorry I trusted u," Jason wrote alongside the snap. "Thanks for killing me. I'd do it again though. That look my khalessi @emilia_clarke ps. I f**king pillow. #hahahahahaha #ohwell #comingbackasaf**kingdragon." Foto kiriman Jason Momoa (@prideofgypsies) pada Okt 2, 2015 pada 6:20 PDT
